item.title: Leopard that was on rampage in Raichur captured by Forest officials
item.description:
<![CDATA[Leopard that was on rampage in Raichur captured by Forest officials
Vartha Bharati | 25-02-2025 | 18:32:00 IST
Raichur: A leopard that had been terrorizing the residents of Maliabad village by preying on their livestock was finally captured on Tuesday morning in a trap set by forest officers. The capture has brought relief to the villagers, who had been living in fear for months.
The leopard was caught around 7:30 AM in a trap placed by the Forest Department in the outskirts of Raichur to...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
